WorkItem.Description:
Assume that my Hunter has the Trueshot Aura Talent.
 
This makes the hunter's DPS not change when I tick the Trueshot Aura Buff in the bufflist -> Correct behavior
 
However, the Pet's DPS changes when adding the tick in the pet's Trueshot Aura bufflist-> Incorrect?
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Pet DPS and Trueshot Aura Buff
